Sections.Name: CompassSettings
Sections.Description: Setup how the compass operates in game.

Keys.Name: EquippableCompass
Keys.Description: Do you want the compass to be an item that must be equipped to use?

Sections.Name: CompassGraphics
Sections.Description: Setup how the compass looks in game.

Keys.Name: GlassTransperency
Keys.Description: How frosted do you want the glass? The lower the value the clearer the glass.

Keys.Name: FrostFadeIn
Keys.Description: How many seconds for the frost effect to fully appear? Seasons & weather will affect this.

Keys.Name: MudLoopTimer
Keys.Description: How many seconds while moving until you possibly get mud on your compass? Seasons & weather will affect this.

Keys.Name: DirtLoopTimer
Keys.Description: How many seconds while moving until you possibly get dirt on your compass? Seasons & weather will affect this.

Keys.Name: DustFadeIn
Keys.Description: How many seconds for the dust effect to fully appear? Seasons & weather will affect this.

Keys.Name: MaxBloodDamageTrigger
Keys.Description: What is the highest percentage of health must be lost before the blood effect can do a random check? It is a random check from (this number * .25f) to this number.

Keys.Name: ZoomIn:FullViewCompass
Keys.Description: Hold to zoom in; double tap for full view.

Keys.Name: ZoomOut:SettingScroll
Keys.Description: Hold to zoom out; double tap for setting scroll.
